1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 from threading import Thread, Event
3 
4 import actionlib
5 from actionlib import ServerGoalHandle
6 import rospy
7 import logging
8 import os
9 
10 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init, async_init
11 
12 from actionlib_msgs.msg import GoalStatus
13 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.ProgramsManager import ProgramsManager
14 
15 # Command Status
16 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
17 
18 # Messages
19 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import Program, ProgramList
20 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramResult, ExecuteProgramFeedback, ExecuteProgramGoal
21 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.msg import ExecuteProgramAction
22 
23 # Services
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import Trigger, GetString
25 from niryo_robot_database.srv import GetSettings, SetSettings
26 
27 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import GetProgram, GetProgramList
28 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import GetProgramAutorunInfos
29 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import CreateProgram, DeleteProgram, UpdateProgram
30 from niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2.srv import SetProgramAutorun, SetProgramAutorunRequest
31 
32 
33 class ProgramManagerNode:
34 
35  def __init__(self):
36  rospy.logdebug("Programs Manager - Entering in Init")
37 
38  # Autorun
39  self.__get_setting_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_database/settings/get', GetSettings)
40  self.__set_setting_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_database/settings/set', SetSettings)
41 
42  database_path = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param('/niryo_robot_database/database_path'))
43  programs_base_dir = os.path.expanduser(rospy.get_param("~programs_dir"))
44 
45  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = None
46  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = None
47  self.__autorun_mode_to_str = {
48  SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE: "DISABLE",
49  SetProgramAutorunRequest.ONE_SHOT: "ONE_SHOT",
50  SetProgramAutorunRequest.LOOP: "LOOP",
51  }
52  self.__str_to_autorun_mode = {v: k for k, v in self.__autorun_mode_to_str.items()}
53 
54  self.__stop_autorun_event = Event()
55 
56  self.__programs_manager = ProgramsManager(database_path, programs_base_dir)
57 
58  # Action Server
59  self.__execute_program_action_server = actionlib.ActionServer('~execute_program',
60  ExecuteProgramAction,
61  goal_cb=self.__callback_execute_program_goal,
62  cancel_cb=self.__execute_program_cancel_cb,
63  auto_start=False)
64  self.__execute_program_action_server.start()
65 
66  self.__execute_program_action_client = actionlib.ActionClient('~execute_program', ExecuteProgramAction)
67 
68  # Services
69  rospy.Service('~create_program', CreateProgram, self.__callback_create_program)
70  rospy.Service('~delete_program', DeleteProgram, self.__callback_delete_program)
71  rospy.Service('~update_program', UpdateProgram, self.__callback_update_program)
72  rospy.Service('~get_program', GetProgram, self.__callback_get_program)
73  rospy.Service('~stop_execution', Trigger, self.__callback_stop_execution)
74  rospy.Service('~get_program_list', GetProgramList, self.__callback_get_program_list)
75 
76  # Publisher
77  self.__program_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~program_list', ProgramList, latch=True, queue_size=1)
78 
79  # - Autorun
80  rospy.Service('~set_program_autorun', SetProgramAutorun, self.__callback_set_program_autorun)
81  rospy.Service('~get_program_autorun_infos', GetProgramAutorunInfos, self.__callback_get_program_autorun_infos)
82  rospy.Service('~execute_program_autorun', Trigger, self.__callback_execute_program_autorun)
83 
84  rospy.on_shutdown(self.stop_program)
85 
86  self.__publish_program_list()
87 
88  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
89  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
90 
91  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Started")
92 
93  def __get_setting_from_db(self, setting_name: str, default_value: str) -> str:
94  try:
95  self.__get_setting_service.wait_for_service(2)
96  except rospy.ROSException:
97  rospy.logerr("Programs Manager - Impossible to connect to the database get setting service")
98  raise
99 
100  response = self.__get_setting_service(setting_name)
101  if response.status < 0:
102  rospy.logwarn(
103  f'The setting "{setting_name}" has not been found in database. Setting it to "{default_value}"')
104  self.__set_setting_service(setting_name, default_value, 'str')
105  return default_value
106  return response.value
107 
108  @property
109  def __autorun_id(self) -> str:
110  if self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id is None:
111  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = self.__get_setting_from_db('autorun_id', '')
112  return self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id
113 
114  @property
115  def __autorun_mode(self) -> str:
116  if self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode is None:
117  autorun_mode_str = self.__get_setting_from_db('autorun_mode', 'DISABLE')
118  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = self.__str_to_autorun_mode[autorun_mode_str]
119  return self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode
120 
121  # -- ROS CALLBACKS
122  # Program
123  def __callback_create_program(self, req):
124  program_id = self.__programs_manager.create_program(req.name,
125  req.description,
126  req.python_code,
127  req.blockly_code)
128  self.__publish_program_list()
129  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Program "{req.name}" successfully created', program_id
130 
131  def __callback_delete_program(self, req):
132  self.__programs_manager.delete_program(req.program_id)
133  self.__publish_program_list()
134  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Program successfully deleted'
135 
136  def __callback_update_program(self, req):
137  if not self.__programs_manager.exists(req.program_id):
138  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST, f'No program with id {req.program_id}'
139  self.__programs_manager.update_program(req.program_id,
140  req.name,
141  req.description,
142  req.python_code,
143  req.blockly_code)
144  self.__publish_program_list()
145  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Program successfully updated'
146 
147  def __callback_get_program(self, req):
148  program = self.program_msg_from_program_manager(self.__programs_manager.get(req.program_id))
149  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Successfully retrieved program "{program.program_id}"', program
150 
151  def __callback_get_program_list(self, _):
152  ros_programs = [self.program_msg_from_program_manager(program) for program in self.__programs_manager.programs]
153  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully retrieved programs', ros_programs
154 
155  def __callback_execute_program_goal(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
156  rospy.logdebug(f'Received goal "{goal_handle.get_goal_id()}"')
157  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
158  status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_PROGRAM_ALREADY_RUNNING
159  message = "Program is already running"
160  goal_handle.set_rejected(ExecuteProgramResult(status=status, message=message), message)
161  return
162 
163  goal = goal_handle.goal.goal
164 
165  if goal.code_string == '' and not self.__programs_manager.exists(goal.program_id):
166  status = CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_FILE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
167  message = "Program does not exist"
168  goal_handle.set_rejected(ExecuteProgramResult(status=status, message=message), message)
169  return
170 
171  rospy.logdebug('Goal accepted')
172  goal_handle.set_accepted()
173  Thread(target=self.__execute_program, args=[goal_handle], daemon=True).start()
174 
175  def __execute_program(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
176  goal = goal_handle.goal.goal
177  try:
178  # execute the program
179  if goal.code_string != '':
180  self.__programs_manager.execute_from_code(goal.code_string)
181  else:
182  self.__programs_manager.execute_from_id(goal.program_id)
183 
184  # handle the feedback
185  feedback = ExecuteProgramFeedback(output=self.__programs_manager.execution_output)
186  while self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
187  if len(self.__programs_manager.execution_output) > len(feedback.output):
188  feedback.output = self.__programs_manager.execution_output
189  goal_handle.publish_feedback(feedback)
190  rospy.sleep(0.1)
191 
192  # set the final goal status
193  if goal_handle.get_goal_status().status == GoalStatus.ACTIVE:
194  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_success:
195  message = 'Execution success'
196  goal_handle.set_succeeded(ExecuteProgramResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message=message),
197  message)
198  else:
199  message = 'Execution failed'
200  goal_handle.set_aborted(
201  ExecuteProgramResult(
202  status=CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED,
203  message=message,
204  ),
205  message)
206  else:
207  rospy.logwarn('The goal status is not "active" anymore. It\'s most likely it has been canceled.')
208  except Exception as e:
209  message = f'An unknown error happened during program execution: {e}'
210  rospy.logerr(message)
211  goal_handle.set_aborted(
212  ExecuteProgramResult(
213  status=CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED,
214  message=message,
215  ),
216  message)
217 
218  def __execute_program_cancel_cb(self, goal_handle: ServerGoalHandle):
219  self.stop_program()
220  goal_handle.set_canceled(
221  ExecuteProgramResult(status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message='The execution has been stopped'))
222 
223  # Autorun
224  def __callback_set_program_autorun(self, req):
225  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_mode = req.mode
226  mode_str = self.__autorun_mode_to_str[req.mode]
227  self.__set_setting_service('autorun_mode', mode_str, 'str')
228 
229  self.__lazy_loaded_autorun_id = req.program_id
230  self.__set_setting_service('autorun_id', req.program_id, 'str')
231 
232  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully set autorun'
233 
234  def __callback_get_program_autorun_infos(self, _req):
235  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'OK', self.__autorun_id, self.__autorun_mode
236 
237  def __callback_execute_program_autorun(self, _req):
238  if self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
239  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_EXECUTION_FAILED, "Program is already running"
240 
241  if self.__autorun_mode == SetProgramAutorunRequest.DISABLE:
242  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - Autorun disable")
243  return CommandStatus.PROGRAMS_MANAGER_AUTORUN_FAILURE, "Autorun disable"
244 
245  def execute_autorun(loop_mode=False):
246  client_goal_handle = self.__execute_program_action_client.send_goal(
247  ExecuteProgramGoal(program_id=self.__autorun_id))
248  while client_goal_handle.get_comm_state() != actionlib.CommState.DONE:
249  rospy.sleep(0.1)
250 
251  if not self.__stop_autorun_event.is_set() and loop_mode:
252  execute_autorun(loop_mode)
253  else:
254  self.__stop_autorun_event.clear()
255 
256  autorun_thread = Thread(target=execute_autorun,
257  daemon=True,
258  args=[self.__autorun_mode == SetProgramAutorunRequest.LOOP])
259  autorun_thread.start()
260 
261  message = "Autorun execution started"
262  rospy.loginfo("Programs Manager - {}".format(message))
263  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, message
264 
265  def __callback_stop_execution(self, _):
266  self.stop_program()
267  self.__execute_program_action_client.cancel_all_goals()
268  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Execution successfully stopped'
269 
270  # - Functions
271 
272  @staticmethod
273  def program_msg_from_program_manager(program):
274  return Program(program_id=program['id'],
275  name=program['name'],
276  description=program['description'],
277  has_blockly=program['has_blockly'],
278  saved_at=program['saved_at'],
279  python_code=program['python_code'],
280  blockly_code=program['blockly_code'])
281 
282  def __publish_program_list(self):
283  ros_programs = [self.program_msg_from_program_manager(program) for program in self.__programs_manager.programs]
284  self.__program_list_publisher.publish(ros_programs)
285 
286  def stop_program(self):
287  if not self.__programs_manager.execution_is_running:
288  return
289 
290  self.__stop_autorun_event.set()
291  self.__programs_manager.stop_execution()
292  self.__stop_robot_action()
293 
294  @staticmethod
295  def __stop_robot_action():
296  # Stop current move command
297  try:
298  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', 1)
299  stop_cmd = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', Trigger)
300  stop_cmd()
301  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
302  pass
303 
304 
305 if __name__ == "__main__":
306  sentry_init()
307 
308  rospy.init_node('niryo_programs_manager_v2', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
309 
310  # change logger level according to node parameter
311  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
312  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
313  logger.setLevel(log_level)
314 
315  try:
316  node = ProgramManagerNode()
317  rospy.spin()
318  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
319  pass
